p: Treatment included corticosteroids and intravenous or oral ribavirin. Although published data are not yet available in humans, animal models suggest that monoclonal antibody to SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV) is effective in decreasing viral replication and improving outcomes [ 26]. The overall case fatality rate during the SARS epidemic was nearly 10% [ 19]. A novel coronavirus was rapidly isolated and identified as the cause of SARS and sequenced, allowing for RT-PCR and serologic testing to be developed [ 29, 30].
